pxchat.net
Class ImageReceiver

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.ImageReceiver
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServerImageReceiver
public class ImageReceiver
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements an image receiver that is able to read images sent by an ImageSender.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Constructor Detail

ImageReceiver

public ImageReceiver(ImageStartFrame startFrame)
Constructs a new image receiver from an image start frame.

Parameters:
startFrame - An image start frame
Method Detail

process

public boolean process(FrameAdapter adapter,
                       ImageChunkFrame frame)
Processes an image chunk frame by copying the data it contains into the internal buffer. The image id of the frame has to be the same this receiver is registered for; in this case this method returns true. Otherwise nothing will be done and this method returns false.

Parameters:
adapter - The adapter the frame was received from
frame - The incoming chunk frame
Returns:
true if the frame was processed

process

public boolean process(FrameAdapter adapter,
                       ImageStopFrame frame)
Processes an image stop frame by completing the internal buffer and converting the data to a buffered image. The newly created image will be put into the ImageTable. The image id of the frame has to be the same this receiver is registered for; in this case this method returns true. Otherwise nothing will be done and this method returns false.

Parameters:
adapter - The adapter the frame was received from
frame - The incoming stop frame
Returns:
true if the frame was processed

getImageID

public int getImageID()
Returns:
the imageID
